item.title: About Me
item.description:
“Nobody ever figures out what life is all about, and it doesn’t matter. Explore the world. Nearly everything is really interesting if you go into it deeply enough.”

― Richard P. Feynman

About ME

Hi, nice to meet you. I’m Felix. I spend my days tapping keyboards and Googling. I use Stack Overflow like Tinder to find soul mates who faced the same programming problems as I do.

I have been lucky enough to work alongside amazing teams of talented people throughout the years. My goal is to create products that can put a smile on millions and influence billions. So if you are working on something cool, aiming to reshape the world, feel free to reach me out~

About Coding

Interest

Aside from coding, I like thinking deep philosophical questions which don’t seem to have any practical usage during my spare time (But you know that’s the fun part :D ). I also enjoy drawing, design, reading all sorts of books, watching documentaries, learning about history & psychology, messing with computer hardware, plastic models and so on.

Skills

Languages: C++, Java, Python, R, VB.net … and More

  • I have used a bunch of different programming languages, but I think the mindset to solve problems is way more crucial than how familiar you are with specific tools, just like doing math.

Scripting: Javascript

Database: Relational(PostgreSQL)

Build/Deploy Tools: Jenkins, Airflow

Source control: Git

OS: Linux, Windows

Project Management: Agile methodology, Scrum

Web: HTML, CSS, React (Currently learning~)

Cloud: GCP BigQuery, GCP Dataproc, GCP CloudSQL

Design: Photoshop, InDesign, After Effect (Currently learning~)

Mobile Dev: Swift, Flutter (Currently learning~)

Projects

Check out “Projects” section for more!

CONTACT

Feel free to reach me out via Linkedin for collaboration or other discussions!
٩(◦`꒳´◦)۶
